Irina Gankova Business Analyst

About Me Involvement

Expertise

I believe in learning throughout life and enjoy solving important problems with technology. This passion led me to become a Business Analyst in Software Development and a mentor for others. I find it rewarding to discover patterns and create solutions to reach goals.

With over 5 years of experience as a Business Analyst, I focus on continuous improvement. I stay updated on new trends and technologies to ensure my solutions are creative and effective.

Management

From planning to elicitation, risks are analyzed, and change strategies defined, transitioning from the current state (as is) to the future state (to be)

Problem-Solver

Complex business challenges are efficiently tackled from identification to solution design through critical thinking and BA Techniques

Systematization

With experience in developing web apps and systems, I prioritize writing well-structured and documented solutions using BA Approaches, UI Design & Prototyping, and Visual Modeling

Involvement

As an active member of the business analysts' community, I engage in discussions, attend training sessions, and participate in networking events. Through this involvement, I continuously gain new knowledge and actively share it with fellow community members. This collaboration helps me improve my skills, fill knowledge gaps, and see things from new perspectives.

In my free time, I enjoy engaging in activities that fuel my passion, such as playing guitar and harmonica, skating, and going on trips. These activities not only energize me but also provide me with the strength and inspiration to further my learning.

Let’s Connect! Feel free to reach out via email or connect with me on LinkedIn. I’m always open to new opportunities and collaborations.
